title: My Pixel 3a speaker is distorted after latest Android 11 update
content: My Pixel 3a updated to Android 11 a few days ago (April, 2021) and my speaker went squirrely. Could NOT listen to YouTube music at all... I see this has happened in the past, safe mode did not help, but (so far) turning off "Hey Google" may have. If it continues to be good I will confirm or report any changes.
